summary: This mod adds seven new weapons. These weapons are similar to Chillrend but are in the form of a warhammer, waraxe, battleaxe, greatsword, mace, sword, dagger, and bow. You can find these in Hjerim, windhelm.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds seven new weapons. These weapons are similar to Chillrend but are in the form of a warhammer, waraxe, battleaxe, greatsword, mace, sword, dagger, and bow. You can find these in Hjerim, windhelm. The names of the weapons are:
                                         chillaxe
                                         chillbow
                                         chillblade
                                         chillhatchet
                                         chillhammer
                                         chillblunt
                                         chillknife
author: Cartertherock
